dict.acceptation: 罐头；（用金属或塑料制作的）容器；（马口铁或其他金属制作的）食品罐头；

sent.orig: If you invert "I can", you have "can I".
sent.trans: 如果你把I can两词前后颠倒一下，就成了can I。

sent.orig: He can't do it, nor can I, nor can you, nor can anybody.
sent.trans: 他不能做，我也不能，你也不能，任何人都不能。

sent.orig: If other people can do it, so can we.; What other people can do we can do, too.
sent.trans: 人家能做到的，我们也能做到。

sent.orig: Neither riches nor honours can corrupt him; neither poverty nor humbleness can make him swerve from principle; and neither threats nor forces can subdue him.
sent.trans: 富贵不能淫， 贫贱不能移，威武不能屈。

sent.orig: A baby can only receive sense impressions,but it can not understand them.
sent.trans: 婴儿只能接受感官方面的印象，而不能理解。
